      • getPosition

        @Basic
public double[] getPosition()
        Return the position of this entity.
        Returns:
        The position of this entity represented by an array as [xPosition, yPosition].

      • setPosition

        @Basic
public void setPosition(double x,
                                double y)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set the position of this entity to the given x and y value.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-component of the position of this entity.
        y - The y-component of the position of this entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given parameter x or y is infinite or equal to NaN | x == INFINITE OR y == INFINITE OR x == NaN OR y == NaN

public double[] getVelocity()
        Return the velocity of this entity.

public void setVelocity(double velocityX,

      • getTotalVelocity

        public double getTotalVelocity()
        Return the length of the velocity vector of this entity.
        Returns:
        | sqrt(getVelocityX()^2+getVelocityY()^2)

      • isValidVelocity

        public boolean isValidVelocity(double velocityX,
                               double velocityY)
        Checks whether the total velocity is smaller than or equal to the speed limit of this entity.
        Parameters:
        velocityX - The x-component of the velocity vector.
        velocityY - The y-component of the velocity vector.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the velocity is smaller than or equal to the speed limit of this entity. | result == sqrt(velocityY^2 + velocityX^2) <= speedLimit

      • isValidSpeedLimit

        public boolean isValidSpeedLimit(double speedLimit)
        Checks whether the given speedLimit is a valid speed.
        Parameters:
        speedLimit - The speed limit that needs to be verified.
        Returns:
        | if (0 <= speedLimit <= c) then true | false otherwise

 @Immutable

      • isValidRadius

        public boolean isValidRadius(double radius)
        Check whether the given radius is a valid radius.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius that needs to be verified.
        Returns:
        | if (radius < getMinimalRadius()) then True | False otherwise
